Auckland rubbish bin removal: Council says bins cost $800-$1000 each https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-rubbish-bin-removal-council-says-bins-cost-800-1000-each/N7RJ4FEVQ5G5RKTIVYTS3WED6E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-rubbish-bin-removal-council-says-bins-cost-800-1000-each/N7RJ4FEVQ5G5RKTIVYTS3WED6E/ Auckland Council estimates savings of $600,000 to $800,000 by reusing removed bins. Hastings vape store sold two single cigarettes for $5 to customers who knew the code https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hastings-vape-story-sold-two-single-香烟-for-5-to-customers-who-knew-the-code/ 3WLJILQ3XNGHJICEL6UPOXIWIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hastings-vape-story-sold-two-single-香烟-for-5-to-customers-who-knew-the-code/ 3WLJILQ3XNGHJICEL6UPOXIWIU/ Doug LaingAn undercover agent used the code, leading to a prosecution and thousands in fines. Single cigarette sales are illegal and the shop owner and an employee were fined a total of $8000 for the offences and related offending. Photo / Chris Hyde
